mapper.select: select user_id from subscribe where companyCode = #{companyCode} and user_id = #{userId} union all select 0 as coin from dual limit 1
mapper.insert: insert into message ( user_id, companyCode, content, date) values ( #{userId}, #{companyCode}, #{content}, #{date} )
mapper.select: select user_name from subscribe join user_tb on subscribe.user_id = user_tb.id where companyCode = #{companyCode}

select v.companyCode, v.companyName, count(user_id) countUser from subscribe s join domestic_stock_code v on s.companyCode = v.companyCode where s.user_id = #{userId} group by companyCode, companyName

select count(distinct s.companyCode) from subscribe s join domestic_stock_code v on s.companyCode = v.companyCode
where companyName like concat('%', #{searchWord}, '%')
